column4: Is there a way to get a process id or something when I call something, so that I could kill it later if I wanted to?

Is there a way to attach something to a process when you call it... I have multiple instances of vlc going and when I call one I want to either know that specific process id so i can kill it later, or attach some sort of handle to it so I can kill it later
That command I showed you will show what it is playing, I think. Then you will known what instance to kill. I have no other idea.
